contactSection.title: Contact Me
contactSection.description: I am available on almost every social media. You can message me, I will reply within 24 hours. I can help you with frontend as well as backend technologies, relational and non-relational databases, unit testing and open-source development.

blogSection.title: Blogs
blogSection.subtitle: For fundamental individual empowerment, I like to write powerful lessons that create an impact on our society.
